name: San Bernardino County Health Permit
description: Mobile food facilities must maintain an active San Bernardino County Environmental Health permit covering all operations within the county.

name: Commissary Agreement
description: Vendors operating in San Bernardino County must file a commissary verification letter showing access to an approved servicing area for storage, cleaning, and wastewater disposal.

name: Fire Prevention Operational Permit
description: San Bernardino County Fire Protection District issues an operational permit for mobile food preparation vehicles to verify suppression systems and propane safety compliance.
